name: Jelly Charm Glazed Lip Stain & Blush With Keychain
about: What it is:A lightweight, buildable lip and blush stain formulated with moisturizing ingredients for a jelly pop of color..Highlighted Ingredients:- Triple Berry Complex:  Skin-protecting properties..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This versatile lip and blush stain comes in six juicy shades for a jelly pop of color. The skin-loving formula helps to moisturize, brighten, and protect, keeping your skin looking and feeling healthy. With its keychain design, you can attach Jelly Charm to your keys or purse to get glazed, any time.
ingredients: -Triple Berry Complex:  Skin-protecting properties..-Lemon Fruit Extract: Moisturizes and visibly brightens skin..-Olive Squalane: Moisturizes skin and provides antioxidant action...Aqua/Water/Eau, Diisostearyl Malate, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diglycerin, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Dipropylene Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Pentylene Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Squalane, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ceteareth-20, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Ethylhexylglycerin, Yellow 6 (Ci 15985), Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Red 33 (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Aluminum Hydroxide, Ammonium Polyacrylate, Red 28 (Ci 45410), Blue 1 (Ci 42090), Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the doe-foot applicator to apply directly on lips or dot on cheeks and blend with fingertips. .-Apply multiple layers to intensify the color..-Attach keychain to your keys, headphones, backpack, or belt and be ready to shine anywhere, any time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just want to preface this review by saying the product is cute and there are no horrible defects or problems with it.   I ordered the Peach color of this product and while it was smaller than anticipated, it was still cute, I liked the packaging. That being said based on my experience and some of the other reviews the color you buy means nothing because after the product sits on your lips for a little while they all turn about the same shade. When I applied this product it started out as the lovely peach shade that I was aiming for but within one or two minutes it became a sort of generic deep pink/ berry color; still very pretty, but not what I really wanted.   Wiping the product off to see the stain, I was also disappointed. My lips looked pretty much the same as whenever I wipe other lip products off my lips-- so the stain was minimal at best.  Using the product as a blush was a bit tricky as well. The formula is very watery and sheer so I had to really work at applying a few layers to achieve a non-patchy and visible blush. It's pretty once you get there but I was hoping for a more seamless application and payoff.  Lastly, the packaging, as I mentioned before very cute. The actual tube of the product is set in a silicone base giving it a bit of charm and protection. Receiving the product brand new-- the silicone has a nice slightly glassy finish. The bottle fell on my floor and instinctively washed the container and unfortunately the silicone does not hold up well to regular soap and water. The gloss is gone, the silicone looks perpetually scuffed even though it isn't, making the product look months older than it really is.   All of these small things combined, I would not purchase any of the other colors, but I will finish this one off because it's still a fine lip product formulation, it was just disappointing on a few of its selling points.

reviews.review_text: I was searching for a non-drying tint/stain, either some kind of balm or non-sticky gloss, and was surprised at how effective this product is! The Squeeze Guava color came out a little more purplish on me than I would've liked, but as it wore off a bit the stain that it left was nice. But best of all, I was shocked at how hydrated my lips actually felt while wearing this, and not just for a few minutes (plus mind you we're having single-digit humidity here in SoCal rn!)  It applies like a gloss but feels more like a balm once on, which for me is ideal. Definitely looking forward to expanded color options!

The applicator is easy to use and has a precise enough tip to line the lips with the stain. Part of me thinks the packaging looks a bit unfinished but I do think the keychain element is unique and makes it convenient to carry this around. I was not expecting to like this, let alone like it so much I bought a second!

reviews.review_text: The Kaja Jelly Charm Lip & Blush Glazed Keychain Stain in shade 05 Peach Fizz is a delightful addition to any beauty lover's collection. It glides on effortlessly and feels weightless on the skin, providing a comfortable wear throughout the day. I was particularly impressed by how it doesn't settle into fine lines or pores, leaving a smooth and radiant finish.  The shade 05 Peach Fizz is a versatile peachy hue that complements a wide range of skin tones. It has a warm undertone that adds a healthy, sun-kissed radiance to the complexion. It's perfect for achieving that lit from within look, especially during the warmer months.  The keychain packaging is not only adorable but also incredibly practical. It's compact and easy to carry around, making touch-ups on the go a breeze. The jelly texture also means it can be applied with fingertips, eliminating the need for additional tools.  What truly sets this product apart is its versatility. It works beautifully as both a lip stain and a blush, allowing for a cohesive and harmonious makeup look. The stain is long-lasting, ensuring that your lips and cheeks stay beautifully flushed for hours without the need for constant touch-ups.  The Kaja Jelly Charm Lip & Blush Glazed Keychain Stain in 05 Peach Fizz has become a staple in my makeup routine. It effortlessly adds a touch of freshness and radiance to my look, whether I'm heading to the office or out for a casual brunch. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a versatile, high-quality lip and blush stain that delivers on both color and comfort. It's a true gem in the world of multitasking makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by kajabeauty the Kaja Jelly Charm Lip & Blush Glazed Keychain Stain in the color Mocha Glazed. This color is like a very light brown and can be built up to get a darker stain. It applies so smooth and doesn't leave any sticky feeling. It has a semi shine, but once completely dry, it has that perfect amount of glow finish to give a hydrated look to the lips and cheeks. I do not wipe it off after applying it, instead I just let it wear off by itself and it's perfect. I thought the brown color would not look good on cheeks but I was wrong! It gives it enough color to look natural and give a bit of a flush look. After it's worn off, it leaves your lips feeling so smooth and soft, it's almost as if I had applied lip balm plus leaves that bit of stain giving the lips a natural flush of color. It has all natural ingredients and I'm thinking the squalene is what gives us that hydration. I love the keychain it comes with because it gives it a pop of color and you can easily attach this to your purse, bookbag, or carry it with your keys. My Personal favorite is having it on the strap of my bag. It's the perfect size to carry with you. I will say it comes at a hefty price point for the amount of product you get but since it's vegan and has so many natural ingredients, I think it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Kaja Beauty. First off, This is my first product from Kaja Beauty and it didn't disappoint! I tested the jelly charm lip and blush glazed keychain stain in the color peach fizz. This is a beautiful color and I love that it is lightweight and sheer . You can apply more than one layer to get a full Glam look or a monochromatic look. I applied this blusher directly on my cheekbones and applied using my fingers. It is a Rose color on my olive neutral skin! I also applied a small amount on my lips after exfoliating with my lip scrub. I am in love with the color and the texture. The texture is very silky and soft. The ingredients are skin loving including Triple berry complex to protect your skin. Lemon fruit extract is moisturizing and helps to brighten skin.  Olive squalene is one of my favorite ingredients for more moisture and provides antioxidants. The packaging for this cheek and lip stain is so adorable! I love the keychain that comes with this product. It is very glamorous and something that I would have loved when I was younger too! The amount is a bit smaller than what I thought it was going to be but this product will still last me months or more. I think for the overall quality that the price is affordable.  This versatile product comes in 6 different shades! I think I'm going to try the Cherry next or the guava. This product is available to purchase at Sephora and at kajabeauty.com. you can attach the keychain to your purse, book bag or in your pocket wherever your preference is. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a buildable stain and the packaging alone is so pretty that I would order it just for that again!

It goes away quickly, but I'd rather it didn't have taste at all. I didn't end up using it as a blush much since it looks kind of patchy on my cheeks, but as a lip product I think it's ok. reviews.review_text: I received this product gifted by Kaja and so far i really like it. The consistency is fairly thin so it doesnt moisturize a whole lot but it stains the lips very well. The first coat is pretty subtle so make sure to layer it and then the color is nice and pigmented. The keychain is adorable so i added it to my keys. Overall i give it like an 8/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this keychain is so adorable and the product is amazing! The formula is super blendable and easily buildable. It‚Äôs lightweight and the applicator is perfect for eyes, lips, and cheeks. I keep it on my car keys because it‚Äôs such a cute keychain with charms! (gifted by Kaja)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this product! I purchased the shade 05 Peach Fizz and then received 02 Squeeze Guava complimentary from Kaja. These can be worn as both cheek and lip products, but my preferred method is as a blush. As a blush, these are so easy and effortless to apply. The product feels almost silky on your skin, and you can either use a brush or your fingers to gently blend. It's hard to overdo these, and as such you may find you want to build for intense color (I used two layers in the photo, applied as blush only). Admittedly this makes it hard for me to gauge if these will show up as much on deeper skin tones, so that is something to keep in mind.  I'll likely end up purchasing more, as I love the formula and the addition of the keychain is just so cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by Kaja products!! I knew I was going to get an amazing product, I am absolutely in love with the color, the formula, the smell, the intensity, and the best part: THE KEYCHAIN, it doesn't feel cheap at all, it is so convenient because I do not have to open my bag to re apply my lipstick, bonus points because it looks pretty. I think the color goes amazing with my skintone, I would say it is more of a brown color on my lips but more of a burgundy on my cheeks. I will definitely be trying the other colors!! Complimentary from Kaja.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tiny tint comes with a really cute keychain. I attached it to the inside of my purse. The tint formula glides on super smoothly and leaves my lips feeling moisturized. The color is noticeable but looks lightweight and natural. On my skin, it absorbs pretty quickly and is easy to blend out. However, as a lip tint it did not last very long for me. I expected it to be more like a stain, but it doesn't have the staying power. Overall it's a nice tint with cute packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Jelly Charm Lip & Blush Glazed Keychain Stain was gifted by Kaja for reviewing purposes.  This is such a cool product. The formula is beautiful and lasts most of the day. It is not drying on my lips either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Kaja!I thorough enjoyed this product! This is a super light weight and blendable blush/lip stain. Recommend using this product for dewy finishes instead of matte, when trying the blush with matte products it did not give the best results (splotching and gathering in places). Overall this is a good product to have on the go and I recommend!

The formula is very clean and light, making the application feel very smooth. A plus is that the pigmentation lasts for several hours! My favorite part about it is the keychain feature. This makes it very easy to transport. This product was gifted to me by Kaja.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Kaja.   This is a pretty typical K-beauty glowy lip stain. I‚Äôm very familiar with the formula as a lot of other Korean makeup brands have similar products, but I think this is a bit more unique among the Western market. This feels like a liquid version of a glowy lip balm that leaves behind a light stain when wiped away. This has a light fruity scent that disappears after a few minutes. Depending on the shade, this leaves behind a stain when wiped off (my shade left a very faint stain, but a darker color may provide different results). The packaging is A+ and is super cute, especially with the key chain. I love that it‚Äôs portable and small enough to carry around easily. Overall, I think this is perfect for those who don‚Äôt like to fuss around too much with their lip makeup, but would still like something that looks like one put in some effort to look good.
